name: fitbit-health-dashboard
description: Fitbit-Grafana is a monitoring stack that extracts Fitbit data and visualizes it using Grafana dashboards. Great for individuals who want to self-host personal health analytics while keeping their activity data private.
features: Health Analytics: Extract Fitbit data, Grafana visualization, Personal health monitoring. Self-hosted fitness tracking.
Data Privacy: Keep health data private. No cloud dependencies.
Activity Tracking: Monitor fitness trends. Data-driven health.
Historical Data: View long-term trends. Progress tracking.
Custom Metrics: Create your own charts. Personalized insights.
Sleep Analysis: Track sleep patterns. Better rest.
Heart Rate: Monitor cardiovascular health. Vital statistics.
Steps and Distance: Track daily activity. Fitness goals.
Self-Hosted: Your health data stays private. Complete control.
